properties.body:
GULF OF GUINEA.
NIGERIA.
PIRACY.
DNC 01.
1. VESSEL ATTACKED IN 04-07.33N 005-24.12E
   AT 112156Z APR. TWO PERSONS MISSING.
   VESSELS ARE ADVISED TO KEEP CLEAR OF THIS
   POSITION AND TO EXERCISE EXTREME CAUTION.
   REPORTS TO IMB PIRACY REPORTING CENTER,
   PHONE: 603 2031 0014, FAX: 603 2078 5769,
   E-MAIL: IMBKL@ICC-CCS.ORG, PIRACY@ICC-CCS.ORG.
2. CANCEL HYDROLANT 868/16.
